link.title: Welcome to Skokie School District 68 in Skokie, IL | Skokie 68

a.span: For E-Learning Resources-Click on this header

div.p: This site provides information using PDF, visit this link to download the Adobe Acrobat Reader DC software.

h1.strong: SKOKIE SCHOOL DISTRCT 68 SCHOOLS AND THE EDUCATIONAL SERVICE CENTER WILL BE CLOSED UNTIL JUNE 9, 2020

h4.strong: District 68 is providing free school breakfasts and lunches to go for anyone 18 years or younger. Click HERE for more information.

If you need to reach your child's school office, or a department head, you may click on this LINK and choose the appropriate site to send an email to. All administrators and office staff are continuing to monitor incoming email and office phones.
For information from the District regarding the Coronavirus (COVID-19), please click HERE. SOCIAL DISTANCING...WHAT IS IT? CLICK HERE

h4.br: Our mission is to develop children who are confident and creative learners. We provide a rigorous curriculum and a supportive school environment that promotes high achievement, encourages personal growth, and meets the unique needs of each child.
If you have questions about registering your child in Skokie School District 68, please email Kristy Morimoto, district registrar, for more information at kmorimoto@skokie68.org.

div.div: Please note: all calendar activities have been cancelled for the remainder of the school year. *Visit your child(ren)'s school site to see additional calendar events specific to their school(s).
